item.title: PyTorch Frameworks
item.description: Catalyst new api… Runner Engine Callback Callback: a powerful abstraction that lets you customize your experiment run logic. Metric Logger Terminal catalyst-dl run -C train_config.yml Pytorch Lightning TODO Links Comparison: 8 Creators and Core Contributors Talk About Their Model Training Libraries From PyTorch Ecosystem, January 17th, 2022

item.title: DL useful stuff
item.description: – the post is in process – git git fetch git rebase git checkout git merge git pull tmux terminal: tmux # start tmux session tmux ls # list sessions tmux a -t <session name> # attach to the session called <session name> tmux kill-session -t <session name> # kill the session called <session name> pkill -f tmux # just kill all tmux windows commands: CTRL+b c Create a new window CTRL+b n Switch to the previous window CTRL+b p Switch to the next window CTRL+b w Choose window from a list CTRL+b , Rename the current window CTRL+b & Kill the current window panes commands:
